results.title: Suffering
results.description: Unpleasantness, discontentment, dissatisfaction, stress, pain, disease, i.e. mild or intense suffering that is inherent in conditioned existence.

results.title: Compassion
results.description: A mental quality of wise empathy in response to suffering, which counters qualities of harm or cruelty.
synonyms: kindness towards those who are suffering

results.title: Perceiving escape
results.description: The contemplative perception that recognizes the way out of bondage after understanding gratification and danger, seeing cessation of an unsatisfactory experience as its true escape.
synonyms: recognizing the way leading beyond suffering
